QueryDefinition.Query:
with a as ( SELECT ENROLID, SEX, DOBYR, DTSTART, DTEND, CASE WHEN DTSTART > DTEND THEN DTSTART ELSE DTEND END as END_DATE, null PLANKEY, null Family, CAP, MEDICARE, STDRACE RACE_SOURCE_VALUE, STDRACE ETHNICITY_SOURCE_VALUE, CASE WHEN STDRACE ='1' THEN 8527 WHEN STDRACE ='2' THEN 8516 ELSE 8522 END AS RACE_CONCEPT_ID, CASE WHEN STDRACE ='4' THEN 38003563 WHEN STDRACE ='9' THEN 38003564 ELSE 0 END AS ETHNICITY_CONCEPT_ID, CASE PLANTYP WHEN 1 THEN 'Medicaid Basic/Major Medical' WHEN 2 THEN 'Medicaid Comprehensive' WHEN 3 THEN 'Medicaid EPO' WHEN 4 THEN 'Medicaid HMO' WHEN 5 THEN 'Medicaid POS' WHEN 6 THEN 'Medicaid PPO' WHEN 7 THEN 'Medicaid POS with Capitation' WHEN 8 THEN 'Medicaid CDHP' WHEN 9 THEN 'Medicaid HDHP' ELSE 'Medicaid Other' END as ps, null EGEOLOC, 44814722 PeriodTypeConceptId, CASE WHEN MHSACOVG IS NULL THEN '0' ELSE MHSACOVG END AS VALUE_AS_NUMBER FROM {sc}.ENROLLMENT_DETAIL JOIN {sc}._chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND ENROLID = ch.PERSON_ID WHERE (DRUGCOVG = '1' OR MEDICARE = '1'))
select *, CASE WHEN MEDICARE = '1' THEN 'D ' ELSE 'N ' END + CASE WHEN CAP = '1' THEN 'C ' ELSE 'N ' END + ps PayerSource, 900000010 AS OBSERVATION_CONCEPT_ID, 'MHSACOVG' AS OBSERVATION_SOURCE_VALUE from a ORDER BY ENROLID
